tinymist.preview.background.enabled.description: This configuration is only used for the editors that doesn't support lsp well, e.g. helix and zed. When it is enabled, the preview server listens a specific tcp port in the background. You can discover the background previewers in the preview panel.

tinymist.preview.background.args.description: The arguments that the background preview server used for. It is only used when `tinymist.preview.background` is enabled. Check `tinymist preview` to see the allowed arguments.
